contact.claim: or let's have a coffee together
contact.heading: Contact Us

boost.heading: Team boost
boost.text: We can work as one of your teams or join an existing team. We can help you with JavaScript or Ruby development.

kickoff.heading: Project kick-off
kickoff.text: We can help you get off the ground faster by offering training, guidance in technological decisions, and setting up core workflows.

product.heading: Whole product
product.text: We can work with you to develop your idea into a full-fledged mobile or web application or a ready-to-use backend solution.

research.heading: And more
research.text: We offer training, audits, and more. Get in touch to see if we can suit your need.

earth.heading: Reachable
earth.text: We meet with you in-person to fully understand your project and deliver the web or mobile applications that best suit your needs.

local.heading: Local
local.text: We have offices in the United States and in Prague

reactbulb.heading: 40 skilled developers
reactbulb.text: We know our stuff. Our devs give advanced workshops on the technologies we work with.

years7.heading: 7 years running
years7.text: Our company’s been operating for more than 7 years.

team.heading: Our team
team.heading2: True perfection lies in people you work with
team.heading3: We create stunning web sites and fresh design
team.heading4: Want to be part of our team?

bluekit.heading: BlueKit
bluekit.intro: BlueKit is our tool for automatically generating a component library from React component files. It offers a visual overview of all components and their props, which is a need for both developers and designers alike. Most importantly, it’s open-source, so anyone can use it.
bluekit.label: Elements library for developers

bluekit.heading: BlueKit
bluekit.intro: BlueKit is our tool for automatically generating a component library from React component files. It offers a visual overview of all components and their props, which is a need for both developers and designers alike. Most importantly, it’s open-source, so anyone can use it.
bluekit.label: Elements library for developers

elevate.heading: ElevateHD
elevate.intro: While we were first called on only to create a minimum viable product for elevateHD, our collaboration grew deeper as we helped find and apply a viable business model, brought the product to the web, and ultimately became responsible for the entire product.
elevate.label: iOS and web application

itsounds.heading: itSOUNDS
itsounds.intro: With itSOUNDS, our task was to bring the company’s online presence in line with its brand identity. Our web redesign not only matched the brand’s high-end nature, but was able to evoke the mysterious charm of listening to music with considered animations and interaction tweaks.
itsounds.label: Premium design speakers

meatandbones.heading: Meat & Bones
meatandbones.intro: Meat & Bones has a special place in our hearts. We’ve been there since its inception, figuring out whether there is enough demand for such a service, and made it grow into the service it is today, using our design, development, and marketing expertise to create something delightful.
meatandbones.label: Dog food service

ppcbee.heading: PPCBee
ppcbee.intro: PPC Bee is a tool for the automation of pay-per-click product campaigns for online stores. Started outside Blueberry as a set of scripts, we grew it into a capable system with a strong team behind it and a user-centric focus.
ppcbee.label: PPC tool for online stores

zaplo.heading: Zaplo
zaplo.intro: With the Zaplo.dk project, we were tasked with figuring out how to make software releases faster for 4finance, a leading global digital consumer finance company. We not only showed how work could be done more efficiently, but also how to communicate effectively and structure code better, setting an example for their other projects to follow.
zaplo.label: Global consumer finance

about.heading: The Challenge
about.subtext1: To test the client’s vision, we created a solid MVP iOS app. Results after testing showed a need for a restructuring of the business concept, and our cooperation with the client shifted to a higher level.
about.subtext2: Our team helped shift focus from a B2C-only solution to both a B2C and B2B platform and brought the app to the web to reach a wider audience. Blueberry is now responsible for product management of the whole platform and drives innovation behind the product.
about.text: Our client came to us with a vision — a fast and affordable interior design service without the inefficiencies of in-person consultations. The client asked us, the developers behind the project, to validate his business idea.

client.heading: About the Client
client.text: elevateHD — Elevate Home Design allows users to quickly and cost-effectively design their own homes. It’s available on both iOS and the web. The service is offered to the end-customer segment, but also exists as a licenced solution for B2B to improve online conversion rate and enhance the shopping experience for the customer.

elevate.heading: elevateHD
elevate.perex: elevateHD is a service that provides affordable home design to its users. While we were first called on only to create a minimum viable product for elevateHD, our collaboration grew deeper as we helped identify a viable business model, brought the product to the web, and ultimately became responsible for the entire product.

project.heading: The Challenge
project.subtext1: To test the client’s vision, we created a solid MVP iOS app. Results after testing showed a need for a restructuring of the business concept, and our cooperation with the client shifted to a higher level.
project.subtext2: Our team helped shift focus from a B2C-only solution to both a B2C and B2B platform and brought the app to the web to reach a wider audience. Blueberry is now responsible for product management of the whole platform and drives innovation behind the product.
project.text: Our client came to us with a vision — a fast and affordable interior design service without the inefficiencies of in-person consultations. The client asked us, the developers behind the project, to validate his business idea.

client.heading: About the Client
client.text: Meat & Bones provides raw dog food as a subscription service. This company has a special place in our hearts. We’ve been there since its inception, figuring out whether there is enough demand for such a service, and helped it grow into the service it is today, using our design, development, and marketing expertise to create a delightful, healthy, and easy way to feed pets.

meatandbones.heading: Meat & Bones
meatandbones.perex: Meat & Bones provides raw dog food as a subscription service. We worked with the company during inception to determine whether or not there was enough demand for such a service. We helped Meat&Bones grow into the service it is today using our design, development, and marketing expertise to create a healthy and easy way to feed pets.

project.heading: The Challenge
project.subtext1: A multidisciplinary team was assigned to the project. In the first phase, we created a landing page and an ad campaign, the goal of which was to gauge the general interest of customers
project.subtext2: After confirming interest, we began the service development process. We researched competitors and interviewed potential customers as a basis, and furthered this with mockups and the release of an MVP. Our first version, which only allowed pre-orders, was used to test and promote the service as well as to gain data for further iteration
project.subtext3: Besides developing the platform, we’re marketing the service and creating new campaigns while we flesh out the website. We’re helping Meat & Bones create a great service for dog-lovers who care about proper nutrition and a healthy life
project.text: The client came to us to gain insight into customer interest for a raw dog food subscription service and asked us to build an online platform focused on the presentation and the delivery of the food.

client.agileText: We know our stuff. Our devs give advanced workshops on the technologies we work with.
client.developmentText: We know our stuff. Our devs give advanced workshops on the technologies we work with.
client.goingText: We know our stuff. Our devs give advanced workshops on the technologies we work with.
client.heading: About the Client
client.text: Tayllor & Cox is an Accredited Training Organisation for PRINCE 2, MOP, ITIL, SCRUM, MSP, ISMS and more accredited by Axelos. At the same time, it works as a Registered Certification Body for professional services, audits and career development. It is eminent in the Czech Republic, and all around Europe.

tcox.heading: Tayllor & Cox
tcox.perex: Tayllor & Cox is a training and certification organisation. The complete redesign of the Tayllor & Cox website was a thorough yet rewarding task for us. We’re quite proud of the meticulously optimized buying process and the more effective homepage, but also of the custom-made CMS we created in the process, making it easy and efficient to administer the complex website.

project.heading: The Challenge
project.subtext1: The project started with analysis of the website, especially focused on the buying process and its weak spots. We also gathered information about customer profiles and did competitor research. After this phase, we started with prototyping the website with respect to key findings about the needs of customers. Findings were reflected in the homepage design to bring important touchpoints to the front. and in the right order.
project.subtext2: Special care was taken with regards to the buying process, where we got through many rounds of iteration and user testing. Innovated backend includes custom made CMS with improved UX and functionality enabling anybody to work with it, ensuring consistency of content design on the website. The backend is connected to and automated email templates system. In general, we have delivered an innovative website with improved usability and higher online conversion potential and the backend easy to maintain, with automated buying process features.
project.text: Tayllor & Cox set a clear goal to create a number one website, representing its dominance and excellence in the market. The client faced many challenges with its robust and complex web presentation. There was no mobile optimization, it was difficult and time consuming to load web content, there was a low rate of online conversions, and the site did not reflect the profile of the most frequent customers enough. Above all, the client wanted to improve the level of automation in the buying process online - i.e. reduce assistance needed by customer support in the order form process.

client.head: The Client
client.heading: About the Client
client.text: 4Finance is a global leader in digital consumer finance, using cutting-edge technology and data to offer fast and convenient loans to customers around the world.

zaplo.heading: Zaplo.dk
zaplo.perex: Zaplo.dk is a web application we made for 4finance, a leading consumer finance company. It allows people to get a loan quickly. In creating it, we not only showed how work could be completed more efficiently, but also how to communicate effectively and structure code better, setting an example for other 4finance projects to follow.

project.heading: The Challenge
project.subtext1: To speed up front-end development, we worked alongside the 4finance team to deeply understand the problem, the product, and the people. This investigation lead us to reorganize the multidisciplinary development teams, which improved the communication between back-end and front-end developers, thus reducing the time needed to complete the process. Taking into account the need for more skilled developers, we researched and selected React.js as the best platform. Besides bringing in more development power, React.js allowed us to reuse more code, significantly reducing development time.
project.subtext2: The project was a resounding success. Zaplo.dk demonstrated how work could be completed more efficiently, created better communication, and improved code structure — setting a precedent for their future projects.
project.text: The client came to us to solve a recurring problem: the development process behind software releases was taking too long. We were tasked with developing a solution as a proof-of-concept of our new approach. We conducted an in-depth analysis of existing 4finance projects and concluded that two main factors were to blame: it was taking too long to make the front-end for websites and it was hard to find developers experienced in the technological framework that was being used.
project.text1_1: The client came to us to solve a recurring problem: the development process behind software releases was taking too long. We were tasked with developing a solution as a proof-of-concept of our new approach.
project.text1_2: We conducted an in-depth analysis of existing 4finance projects and concluded that two main factors were to blame: it was taking too long to make the front-end for websites and it was hard to find developers experienced in the technological framework that was being used.
project.text2_1: To speed up front-end development, we worked alongside the 4finance team to deeply understand the problem, the product, and the people. This investigation lead us to reorganize the multidisciplinary development teams, which improved the communication between back-end and front-end developers, thus reducing the time needed to complete the process.
project.text2_2: Taking into account the need for more skilled developers, we researched and selected React.js as the best platform. Besides bringing in more development power, React.js allowed us to reuse more code, significantly reducing development time.
project.text2_3: The project was a resounding success. Zaplo.dk demonstrated how work could be completed more efficiently, created better communication, and improved code structure — setting a precedent for their future projects.

agile.heading: Agile Development
agile.text1: We follow the Scrum agile development methodology. We work in short iterations called sprints. After each sprint, we deliver a working product with new features and present it to you.
agile.text2: You are always in control of the development process and can make changes to the product as we go, and ultimately decide when the right time to launch is. While we build, we gather feedback from  customers and make sure that we're developing the right product.

brief.heading: Brief
brief.text: We are open to discussing your business. The first meeting helps both sides understand each other and set the right expectations.

workflow.heading: We are proud of how we work

idea.heading: Ideation & Exploration
idea.text: Based on different types of research, we approach design challenges with the whole team from multiple perspectives. This helps us map out user behavior and understand it.

prototype.heading: Prototype & Visual Design
prototype.text: We start to sketch with pen and paper to capture our initial thoughts. We then convert these wireframes into a clickable prototype using various digital design tools. The prototype is used to test our ideas and assumptions in the real world. And finally, we prepare high fidelity visual design.

research.heading: Research
research.text: No business plan survives first contact with customers. Understanding real people and their needs is at the core of what good design is built on. That is why basic assumptions need to be verified at the beginning. However, collecting continuous feedback is key for further improvement and allows us to respond flexibly to the users' needs. We see research as a process rather than a stage.

strategy.heading: Digital Strategy Consultation
strategy.text: Before we start designing your product, it is extremely important for us to get familiar with your business idea. Furthermore, we will help you analyze your business environment and define your target audience. Based on the needs of your customers, we will propose an appropriate digital strategy that will fit your business. Before we move on, we will test our assumptions.

ux.heading: UX Design
ux.text: User-centered design is our path to digital excellence. Combining research, creative ideas and prototyping, we design a product based on real user insights and with clear KPIs.
